title: The Lawnmower man
creator_credit: New Line Cinema, Allied Vision, Lane Pringle Productions, Fuji Eight, Gimel Everett and Brett Leonard
brief_description: A brilliant scientist, obsessed with perfecting a revolutionary virtual reality software program, enlists the aid of a slow-witted gardener, only to encounter a shadowy group seeking to turn the “lawnmower man” into the ultimate weapon. Stars Pierce Brosnan with Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Mark Bringleson, Geoffrey Lewis.
